11.ara-name: كتاب النكاح عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that:The Messenger of Allah said: "Every Khutbah that does not have the Tashah-hud in it, then it is like a severed hand

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي خُطْبَةِ النِّكَاحِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Marriage Khutbah
